citation.case_name: Civil Liberties for Urban Believers v. City of Chicago, Illinois

html:
541 U.S. 1096

CIVIL LIBERTIES FOR URBAN BELIEVERS ET AL.
v.
CITY OF CHICAGO, ILLINOIS, ET AL.

No. 03-1397.

Supreme Court of United States.

June 7, 2004.

1

C. A. 7th Cir. Motions of Becket Fund for Religious Liberty et al. and American Jewish Congress et al. for leave to file briefs as amici curiae granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 342 F. 3d 752.
